function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven distribution of green and open spaces in the City of Vienna","Impact":"Negative impact on the resilience of cities and their people, especially during lockdowns","Mitigation":"Implement measures to increase green infrastructure in areas with lower green space availability","Technologies":"Urban planning and design technologies to incorporate green spaces in urban areas","People":"City residents, especially those living in areas with lower green space availability","Owner":"City government and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Consequences of lack of green open space in the city","Impact":"Negative impact on human health and wellbeing, particularly during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Develop policies to ensure access to green open spaces for all populations, especially during lockdowns","Technologies":"Urban green infrastructure development, policy planning and implementation","People":"All populations in the city, particularly vulnerable groups","Owner":"City government and urban planning authorities"}]}
